answers.answer: the joint pain is not a common sequela of liver transplantation whereas the de novo development of diabetes is.  probably 40-50% of patients taking prograf can develop diabetes

question: 11 months post liver transplant I was diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes due to Prograf (Tacrolimus) immuneosuppressant medication.  How common is this?  Also joint pain increases at my right hip.
title: Progaf and Diabetes
